field.name: summary
field.value: Add hook to allow lresolution of unregistered components.

field.name: description
field.value: Currently MK does check the components it has registered, and if it can not find one, it throws. It would be beneficial if it exposed a hook that external entities (facilities?) could hook in to and provide resolved components. - One scenario where this would be useful is WCF facility, if would allow for resolution of services/client proxies that are specified in .config file only. - Another would be integration of Windsor and MEF (or any other similar tool like other DI framework). If Windsor would not have a component it could delegate the resolution to MEF.
